author: kevin
msg: ISIS-118 and ISIS-119: Working on getting collections to load and resolve properly. Added support for allInstances to return instances of subclasses, too.

author: dkulp
msg: When running in a place (like OSGi) where an MBeanServer is available
via a Bus extension, go head and use it to register our beans.

author: jvs
msg: HIVE-2426. Test that views with joins work properly.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-1328. java: TBaseHelper.toString(...) appends ByteBuffer data outside of valid buffer range
This patch now correctly considers both arrayOffset and position when determining how to access the backing array of a buffer.

author: olegk
msg: Updated the reverse proxy example; fixed a minor bug in HttpAsyncServiceHandler
